# Simulation Result Table

\begingroup
<!-- \setlength{\LTleft}{0pt minus 5000pt} -->
<!-- \setlength{\LTright}{0pt minus 5000pt} -->
\fontsize{12pt}{18pt}\selectfont
\addtolength{\tabcolsep}{-2pt}

```{r}
#| echo: false
load(here::here("sim-results","rdata/sim_res_05_aug.RData"))
kableExtra::kbl(final_res, booktabs = TRUE, digits = 3,
                align = paste0(rep('c', 13),collapse = ""),
                col.names = c("m", "n", "$\\widehat{MOR}$", "$\\widehat{SE}(MOR)$",
                              "$\\widehat{\\sigma_u^2}$", "$\\widehat{\\beta_0}$",
                              "$\\widehat{\\beta_1}$", "$\\widehat{\\beta_2}$",
                              "CI\\_coverage", "$Sim\\_\\widehat{SE(MOR)}$",
                              "Relative Bias (\\%)", "Problems", "Runs used"), escape = FALSE)
```

\endgroup

\vspace{10mm}

Here,

- True $MOR$ is 4.52
- True $\sigma^2_u$ is 2.5
- "Problems" column represent out of 1000 simulation runs, how many runs were problematic
- "Runs used" column represent how many simulation runs were used to calculate the numbers in the corresponding row.
